20110107020756.000|20110107020759.000|CC1|HAS SUSPENDED THREE EXECUTIVES  
20110107020759.000|20110107020800.000|CC1|SUSPECTED OF LEAKING INFORMATION
20110107020800.000|20110107020801.000|CC1|ON ELECTRIC VEHICLES.           
20110107020801.000|20110107020802.000|CC1|THE CAR MAKER SAYS THE THREE    
20110107020802.000|20110107020803.000|CC1|SUSPECTS HAVE COMMITTED         
20110107020803.000|20110107020806.000|CC1|MISCONDUCT THAT INFRINGES       
20110107020806.000|20110107020808.000|CC1|RENAULT'S CODE OF ETHICS        
20110107020808.000|20110107020809.000|CC1|CONSCIOUSLY AND DELIBERATELY    
20110107020809.000|20110107020811.000|CC1|RISKING THE COMPANY'S ASSETS.   
20110107020811.000|20110107020812.000|CC1|FURTHER DETAILS HAVEN'T BEEN    
20110107020812.000|20110107020813.000|CC1|DISCLOSED.                      
20110107020813.000|20110107020814.000|CC1|THE FRENCH INDUSTRY MINISTER    
20110107020814.000|20110107020816.000|CC1|SAID ON THURSDAY THE CASE IS    
20110107020816.000|20110107020817.000|CC1|ABOUT RENAULT'S DEVELOPMENT OF  
20110107020817.000|20110107020818.000|CC1|AN ELECTRIC CAR.                
20110107020818.000|20110107020820.000|CC1|THE MINISTER DESCRIBED THE      
20110107020820.000|20110107020821.000|CC1|MATTER AS SERIOUS SAYING THAT   
20110107020821.000|20110107020824.000|CC1|THE CASE CONFIRMS THE RISKS     
20110107020824.000|20110107020825.000|CC1|FRENCH COMPANIES FACE FROM      
20110107020825.000|20110107020826.000|CC1|INDUSTRIAL ESPIONAGE AND        
20110107020826.000|20110107020828.000|CC1|CORPORATE INTELLIGENCE.         
20110107020828.000|20110107020830.000|CC1|LOCAL MEDIA REPORTED THAT THREE 
20110107020830.000|20110107020832.000|CC1|EXECUTIVES LEAKED INFORMATION   
20110107020832.000|20110107020833.000|CC1|ABOUT AN ELECTRIC VEHICLE THAT  
20110107020833.000|20110107020835.000|CC1|RENAULT AND ITS JAPANESE PARTNER
20110107020835.000|20110107020837.000|CC1|NISSAN ARE NOW DEVELOPING.      
20110107020837.000|20110107020839.000|CC1|THEY HAVE TOGETHER INVESTED     
20110107020839.000|20110107020842.000|CC1|ABOUT $5.3 BILLION ON THE       
20110107020842.000|20110107020842.000|CC1|PROJECT.
